name: Tiedotuspostigeneraattori
author: Tomi Ylä-Soininmäki

sections.description: A rather simple mailing platform. Creates a new post type, which are then used to generate a newsletter email with multiple subjects and messages.
sections.installation:
1. Upload plugin-name.php to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Set the settings in the Newsletter settings menu for the plugin
sections.changelog:
0.3.1

  • The settings screen now has better default options

0.3

  • Lots of new settings
  • Custom hooks introduced
  • Layout optimizations

0.2.1 – 0.2.3

  • Fixed a bug with Finnish translation

0.2

  • Better ordering of subjects
  • Added more styling options – Now you can style the whole letter as you wish
  • The plugin is now more modular via custom hooks
  • Changed the language to English, with Finnish translation

0.1.1

  • Changed the name of the plugin
  • Added info about the plugin

0.1

  • Initial release. First version only in Finnish. Still in development, but plugin is usable and stable, and is already in use in a few organizations and in a commercial business.

short_description: Plugin generates a mailing platform, mainly for organizational info newsletters.
description: A rather simple mailing platform. Creates a new post type, which are then used to generate a newsletter email with multiple subjects and messages.
